'''"Help!!!"''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

One copy of "Help!!!" is obtained from {{Quest|A Cloud-Sea Appeal, a Brilliance Revealed (Quest)}} after choosing the "afraid" option.
